property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
notes
property.value:
This map is an enhanced version of the revised map with some changes like the addition of the cavalry unit, the addition of the Iwo Jima Island, and many others.

Territory Connection notes:
Southern Europe does NOT connect to 16 SZ
Brazil does NOT connect to 19 SZ
Argentina does NOT connect to 22 SZ
Peru does NOT connect to 43 SZ or 54 SZ
Himalaya does NOT connect to Kazakh S.S.R
